content: And that's kind of led our business towards increasing resources to the owner-direct side, we're seeing really two different things from a market perspective is short term, quick hitting T&M work built from our maintenance base that continues to increase, at the same time from a larger project capital, spend perspective, I think with rising energy prices and inflation, it's kind of led to our strategy as well, too, because larger construction projects have taken longer, they're worried about inflationary cost, it's kind of pushed potentially those building owners to think about the capital expenditure and infrastructure projects, which has really helped us from that perspective.
